310600.name: Collector's Edition DLC
310600.description:
Includes


  • Design Book of Monochroma : Our story while we were developing the game, development process, concept arts, decisions and back stories.
  • Soundtrack: from Gevende exclusive for Monochroma, probably one of the best soundtracks ever for a game
  • Comic Book
  • Desktop Wallperpers from concepts arts and for different desktop sizes
  • Hint Book made from the initial puzzle designs, a bit obsolote after the latest updates of the game

Books are in PDF format and the soundtrack is in WAV format
